A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm a longtime SW fan and tolerated the direction with SW:TFA but Last Jedi was terrible.  It certainly did not \"deliver emotion-rich action\" or \"honor the legacy\" as RT puts it!  I likely won't see another SW at theatres again since they slide garbage like this out and then called it \"92%! Fresh!\" - critics must be getting paid to peddle this.
